title: Poland: Citi Handlowy and Citibank International plc Receive Poland's 2011 Top Employers Certificate for the Second Consecutive Time
summary: Warsaw - Citi Handlowy and Citibank International plc have received the 2011 Poland Top Employers Certificate and have been named in a prestigious group of Poland's top employers. The distinction, awarded to Citi Handlowy for the second straight year, is awarded by the Corporate Research Foundation to companies for which the human resources policy scored very highly. This year, the Foundation selected 32 organizations.
tag-1: Poland: Citi Handlowy and Citibank International plc Receive Poland's 2011 Top Employers Certificate for the Second Consecutive Time
tag-2: Warsaw – Citi Handlowy and Citibank International plc have received the 2011 Poland Top Employers Certificate and have been named in a prestigious group of Poland's top employers. The distinction, awarded to Citi Handlowy for the second straight year, is awarded by the Corporate Research Foundation to companies for which the human resources policy scored very highly. This year, the Foundation selected 32 organizations.
tag-3: "For the second time, Citi Handlowy received the Top Employers Certificate, and I am very proud of this distinction. I hope that this certificate will attract even more talented people to our institution," said Ewa Krakowiak – Swiatnicka, HR Head for Poland, CE, Turkey and Israel.
tag-4: "We are a company that provides services. We do not have any manufacturing plants, but we have our employees who are our most valuable asset," commented Beata Skawinska, Representative, Citibank International PLC.
tag-5: The Top Employers Certificate is awarded only to those institutions that have the best standards in human resources management. The award decision was based on an independent survey conducted by the Corporate Research Foundation, a leading organization specializing in human resources policy. The survey examines all important areas of HR management such as remuneration and benefits policy, career path opportunities, working conditions and corporate culture.
tag-6: For a short Youtube.com recording from the award Ceremony, please visit http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rbUhT08peaA.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-8: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://new.citi.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
tag-9: Citi Handlowy Citi Handlowy is one of the major financial institutions in Poland and offers, under the Citi Handlowy brand, a broad range of state-of-the-art products in corporate, investment and consumer banking. Through its modern distribution channels and a network of over 149 branches, Bank Handlowy services 20,000 corporate customers and 965,000 individual ones. The Bank's group includes Dom Maklerski Banku Handlowego (brokerage house) and Handlowy Leasing. Being a member of Citi enables the customers of Bank Handlowy access to financial services provided in over 100 countries. Further information is available at www.citihandlowy.pl.
